LanguageData.Empire_SIW_OpenOverviewDesc: Here you can see everything about your settlement! Facilities, workers and local decisions are made here.
LanguageData.Empire_SIW_SlotLocked: This slot is currently locked!\nUpgrade your settlement to unlock it.
LanguageData.Empire_SIW_SlotInConstruction: Something is getting built here. Wait for it to finish or cancel the production.
LanguageData.Empire_SIW_ClickToDeconstructOrChangeFac: Click to swap the buildings or deconstruct the existing one
LanguageData.Empire_SIW_NoProcesses: This settlement is currently not working on any special project.
LanguageData.Empire_SIW_CanNotUpgrade_MaxStage: You can't upgrade this settlement past the maximum stage of 12!
